# Load libraries
```{r, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
source("spaghetti_functions.R")
```

## 1. Open the box of pasta and take a look inside.
```{r}
head(box)
# The box contains pasta, and it is not yet cooked.
```

## 2. Put water into a pot
```{r}
pot <- data.frame(ingredient = "water", cooked = 0) # the water is cold.
```

## 3. Heat the water
```{r}
pot <- cook(pot, "water", 10)
```
